content: Hi I received a 0 on finger exercise #6, though I believe my code is correct. subject: finger exercise grades

content: I'm sorry but we can't allow resubmission of fex6. Remember that the test cases are there to help you figure out where you went wrong. I'll make a note of your situation and take it into account for final grades.
